profile: I’m a UI & UX Designer who is passionate about creating digital strategies, products and services for companies and startups. For me, the most enjoyable part of a designer's work is being able to create something new. I believe that design is one of the many ways to solve digital problems. I am currently working full time at HomiEx Digital Exchange Company. I am working on projects including web design, branding & identity, environmental graphics. Before this, I worked as a graphic designer for about 10 years and performed many different tasks in various categories. I am a person who is always keen to learn and pick up new skills, and used to working in fast-paced working environment. Thus I am confident that I can adapt to new working environment and take on new challenges in my career.
name: Meigan Wong

experience.title: Product Designer
responsibilities: Responsible for designing different type of website and social media banners.
Partially responsible for editing our website front-end page by coding.
Designing HomiEx platform collaborating with the developer team to define use cases and turn conceptual ideas into data visualizations and workflows.
Work with engineers on edge cases, error states, loading & empty states etc.
Make sure designs are consistent with the design system.

experience.title: UI & UX Designer
responsibilities: Works closely with Developer, and Marketing Manager to develop user-centered features.
Monitor work against the production schedule, provide updates to the design and development manager and report any technical difficulties.
Create inspiring design work and maintains a positive role in our company culture.
Execute all visual design stages from concept to working with backend developers.

experience.title: Freelance Graphic Designer
responsibilities: Experienced working on different type of company such as Advertising Company, Local Agencies and Retail In-house company.
Boosted confidence for future challenges in the society.
Performed job includes both above and below-the lines.

experience.title: FA Designer
responsibilities: Performed visual analysis on a day-to-day basis for a wide range of advertising collaterals for clients from multiple industries.
Engaged in the creation of both above-the-line and below-the line designs.
Created Artwork in OOH such as Bus, Taxi, Outdoor Banners, Box packaging and provide mock-ups for clients.
Assist the artworks using Powerpoint for presentation.

experience.title: FA Artist
responsibilities: Coordinated with Art Directors, Account Managers, Studio and Project Managers to ensure a high level of client satisfaction with adaptation and finished artworks.
Performed visual analysis on a day-to-day basis for a wide range of advertising collaterals for clients from multiple industries.

trainings.name: Design and develop an interactive front-end of a website or web application using HTML, CSS, Javascript and Jquery. Learn object oriented programming using PHP. Design, develop, deploy and test web applications using PHP & MySQL. Design, implement and test procedural programming solutions using Python.

This course is designed to teach without technical knowledge to design and build a friendly and functional website. Emphasis is rooted on design aesthetics, functionality and navigation friendliness using Adobe Dreamweaver. Learn basic web programming language via CSS and HTML coding. Create user friendly user interface through wireframe planning.
Diploma of Graphic Design (Print)
